sense.gloss: accompaniment for traditional performances (noh, kabuki, etc.), orchestra, band
five court-musician dolls at the Girl's Festival (in March)
to praise extravagantly, to lionize, to lionise, to make much of
to play accompaniment, to keep time
to jeer, to mock, to banter
meaningless words added (to a traditional Japanese song) for rhythmical effect, words or utterances added to modulate the cadence of a song, non-lexical vocables
musical accompanist (in noh, kabuki, etc.), background instruments
to spread (e.g. a rumour), to talk about (widely), to make fun of
to sing the praises of, to praise to the skies
to jeer, to mock, to make fun of
